name: Hello-world
body:
Welcome to my homepage.
This page has been created as a part of an experiment and it is one of my first WebPages created through GitHub.
So I would like users to come up with suggestions on ways to improve the layout and user friendliness of this page.
Thank You.

(http://realitysandwich.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/217618-generic-happiness.jpg)
### Designer Templates
The templates have been automatically generated by GitHub and i just had to chose one and apply it.

### Creating pages manually
My next project will surely focus on creating a project manually instead of auto generation.
### Authors and Contributors
96sudeshnasen.github.io# 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
